attributes.action: Make it compulsary for all school leavers that do not progress to any form of further education after there schooling, to be forced into 2 years with the armed services to learn discipline and skills which are needed to survive in life.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's about time that we stop ignoring the fact that our youth are becoming more of a problem then ever before, its now time to enforce further eduction after leaving school or take the alternative to of 2 years minimum service with the armed forces (any). This will teach the youth of today discipline, and much needed skills to survive in a rapidly moving society. It will also increase the whole protective force for the whole of the UK.
